org.sd.text.lucene
Class LuceneBundle

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.lucene.LuceneBundle

public class LuceneBundle
extends java.lang.Object

Container for a lucene store and a lucene searcher over the same index.

Author:
Spence Koehler

search

public org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs search(java.lang.String queryString,
                                               int n)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Perform a search over the index.

Where queryString is of the form: "field:value,..." where field if preceded by '+' is 'anded' or if preceded by '^' is 'not-ed'.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
